Special Powers
MOVEMENT: Hindering, Outdoor Blocking
EXCALIBUR, MYSTICAL PROTECTORS: [Mystics TA], but only triggers during range attacks. Rictor has PROTECTED: [Mystics TA].
I KNOW A THING OR TWO ABOUT MOVING EARTH: Barrier. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 1 blocking terrain marker. When Rictor uses Barrier, after resolutions you may remove 1 blocking terrain marker adjacent to the generated marker(s).
I AM EVERYWHERE YOU HAVE EVER STOOD: Quake. When Rictor uses it, he may also target opposing characters within range that are adjacent to squares of blocking terrain.
